Member Function Documentation

static MOC_Inflector::rules ( $  type,
$  rules = array() 
) [static]

Adds custom inflection $rules, of either 'plural' or 'singular' $type.

Parameters:
string $type The type of inflection, either 'singular' or 'plural'
array $rules Array of rules to be added. Example usage: MOC_Inflector::rules('plural', array('/^(inflect)or$/i' => '')); MOC_Inflector::rules('plural', array( 'rules' => array('/^(inflect)ors$/i' => ''), 'uninflected' => array('dontinflectme'), 'irregular' => array('red' => 'redlings') )); public
Returns:
void

static MOC_Inflector::humanize ( $  lowerCaseAndUnderscoredWord  )  [static]

Returns the given underscored_word_group as a Human Readable Word Group. (Underscores are replaced by spaces and capitalized following words.)

Parameters:
string $lower_case_and_underscored_word String to be made more readable
Returns:
string Human-readable string public

static MOC_Inflector::tableize ( $  className  )  [static]

Returns corresponding table name for given model $className. ("people" for the model class "Person").

Parameters:
string $className Name of class to get database table name for
Returns:
string Name of the database table for given class public

static MOC_Inflector::slug ( $  string,
$  replacement = '_',
$  map = array() 
) [static]

Returns a string with all spaces converted to underscores (by default), accented characters converted to non-accented characters, and non word characters removed.

Parameters:
string $string the string you want to slug
string $replacement will replace keys in map
array $map extra elements to map to the replacement
Returns:
string public
